attributes.action: Dismiss MP’s in breach of rules of conduct. Failing the wishes of constituents
attributes.additional_details: All self evident from events in the Commons.
attributes.background: It is clear under Parliamentary rules that rebel remain MP’s are in breach of Parliamentary standards . They need to be removed from office in the interests of democracy

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for people to lose their jobs.

You might like to sign this petition about recalling MPs:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/270324
